titles.title: Hunger Relief Trucking Tax Credit Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a tax credit for the transportation of food for charitable purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 10/13/2011--Introduced. Hunger Relief Trucking Tax Credit Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax credit for the cost of transporting food to assist hunger relief efforts of certain charitable organizations.
